choices: The light shrinks Matt.
The light shrinks Zach.
The light grows both of them!
The light shrinks both of them and sends them to an anime world.
The light does nothing (for now).
1.content:
The story begins in home of Matthew’s family. The twenty-year-old is alone, since his parents had won a trip to another state for a week. Matt was laying on his bed, relaxing in the silence. It wasn’t going to last…Matt knew that.

“Let’s see,” Matt looked at his watch. The second hand slowly ticked by. “Three…two…one…”

*Ding Dong*

“Right on cue.” Matt muttered as he hopped out of bed and scratched his dirty blond hair. He made his way out of his room, down the stairs into the living room, and to the front door. He unlocked the door and opened it…

“BIG BROTHER!!!” Zach shouted as he jumped through the doorway and tackled Matt. If the older boy hadn’t been expecting it, he would have been on the ground right now.

“Hey there, little bro.” Matt said as Zach hugged him. “How was your last day of school?”

“Good. I’m so glad summer vacation’s here!” exclaimed the sixteen-year-old. The teen’s childish tone of voice made Matt chuckle.

“You wanna head up to my room?”

“Sure! I want to tell you about all the things I have planned for the summer! We’re going to have a blast!”

Matt and Zach both made their way away from the door and back up to Matt’s room. The two of them weren’t really brothers, but they were so close that they thought of each other as that. They also had a lot in common, more than even normal brothers. They both liked the same kind of anime and played the same video games. Sometimes, Zack would come over Matt’s house just so they could watch anime to together or play his newest game.

Once they had reached Matt’s bedroom, Zach took his usual spot on the bed while Matt sat down at his computer desk. Zach was about to start explaining his plans when he glanced at the computer remembered something.

“Hey, Matt, have you added to my interactive yet?” Zach asked, speaking of his newest macro story on writing.com. That was another thing about the two; they were both macrophiles who loved adding to each other’s stories.

“The new anime one? No, not yet. I’ll do that right now, okay?” Matt replied, spinning his computer chair so he was facing his laptop. As Matt got to work, Zach started telling his big brother about all the things he had planned for the summer. The teen stood up as he talked and wandered around the room. He liked looking at all the interesting stuff Matt had; a rapier on the wall, a wooden staff from Jamaica, a model battleship the two of them had made years ago, and even his pet lizard named Scorch.

“…and we defiantly have to go to the beach this year! I really want to…” Zach trailed off when he spotted a strange golden box on top of the dresser. “Hey, what’s this?”

Matt looked up from his writing and said, “That box? I bought it at an antique store yesterday.”

Zach took the box off the dresser and slowly opened it. Inside was a small gray shard about he size of his thumb. The teenaged boy took the strange piece of rock out of the box and examined it.

“Did this come with it?”

“Yeah. The owner probably left it in there or something.”

“What does it do?”

“What do you mean ‘what does it do’?” It’s a rock, Zach.”

“Maybe it’s a magic rock that shrinks people!” Zach joked, grinning.

“You’ve been reading too many stories. Speaking of which, I’m finished.” Matt pressed the enter key on the keyboard, successfully posting the new chapter.

“Let me see!” Zach said as he rushed toward the computer. Before he could reach it, he accidentally tripped over Matt’s fan and fell onto the carpet.

“Whoa! Zach, are you alright?!” Matt asked, hoping his brother hadn’t harmed himself in anyway. Before the older boy could get up off the chair, he heard something hit his wall and shatter. The shard had slipped out of Zach’s hand when he fell and hit the back wall.

“Oh no! Sorry, big brother!!” Zach apologized as he started picking himself off the floor. Just as he got onto one knee, a sudden light appeared out of nowhere. The broken rock had been shattered into pieces and was somehow releasing this brilliant light. Both brothers shielded their eyes, unable to look at the light. The whiteness quickly filled the room and consumed the two friends…
1.title: The Start of it All

choices: Matt spots Zach.
Matt spots Zach, but thinks he's a bug.
Matt doesn't notice Zach.
The doorbell rings (again).
Other
12.content:
Zach found himself waking up in Matt’s room. Strange…he didn’t remember falling asleep. The sixteen-year-old sat up and rubbed his eyes.

“What just happened, big brother?” Zach asked as he looked over at the computer chair…and saw a giant foot! “AHH!!” Zach leaped back in shock as his eyes trailed up the leg and torso until he saw the sleeping face of Matt. He was gigantic…everything was gigantic! That must mean… “Holy crap! That rock really does shrink people!” Zach exclaimed as he examined himself. Instead of being scared or worried, the boy smiled happily. “This is awesome! I can’t wait to see the look on Matty’s face when he sees me like this!”

As soon as he said this, he heard the sounds of Matt’s groans as he stirred awake.

“Ugh…Zach, are you okay?” Matt muttered as he held his throbbing head. That light hadn’t just blinded him; it knocked him out! When Matt didn’t get an answer, he looked over to where Zach should have been, but saw nothing but his empty room. “Zach?”

Matt’s little friend watched as he stood up from the chair and started walking toward him. At first he thought it was because Matt had seen him, but the giant boy wasn’t looking down at him! It suddenly dawned on Zach that his big bro might step on him without knowing! These fears became all the more real when the sounds of Matt’s socked feet stomping toward him got louder and louder…

“No! Big brother, don’t step on me!” Zach cried, but his bro couldn’t hear him. “I’m down here!”

When it became apparent that Matt couldn’t hear him and wasn’t stopping, Zach decided it was time to move and quickly ran to avoid his brother’s giant feet. He managed to get out of the way just as a shadow loomed over him and one of Matt’s feet crashed down where he was once standing. The gust of air created from the impact blew Zach off his feet and sent him flying forward.

“Ow…maybe this isn’t as awesome as I thought…” Zach said to himself as he rubbed his arm. Meanwhile, Matt unknowingly almost stepped on his close friend and made his way to his door. He opened it and stuck his head into the hallway.

“Little bro!! You here?!” he yelled into the house, hoping for some response. When he didn’t get anything of the sort, Matt closed the door again and placed his hands on his hips. “Maybe he went home? I’ll try emailing him…”

Matt turned around and started stomping back over to the computer. Once again, Zach was right in his path and in danger of being squashed under those huge feet. Instead of getting out of his way immediately, the high schooler waved his arms franticly and shouted at the top of his lungs.

“I’m right here, big brother!! Look down!! Please!!” Zach shouts, hoping his voice wasn’t drowned out by the sound of the socked feet slapping against the floor. He thought this whole shrinking thing was cool, but he didn’t want to end up a red stain on his bro’s socks!
12.title: Littler Little Brother

choices: Matt agrees. He's starting to enjoy this...
Matt refuses.
Other.
121.content:
As Matt made his way to his computer he heard a faint voice. At first he thought he was hearing things, but then it happened again. It sounded like someone was whispering his name. Matt, puzzled, glanced around his room a bit before his eyes fell down to his feet. There, directly in front of him, was some kind of small creature. Matt squatted down to get a closer look and his eyes almost popped out f his head.

“Z-Zach?!” Matt cried, not believing what he was seeing.

“Oww! Not so loud, big brother!” Zach shouted a she covered his ears. Matt’s voice was so unbelievably loud to him. Matt quietly apologized before he gently scooped Zach into his palm and sat down on his bed. He brought his tiny friend up to his face.

“How in the world did this happen?” Matt asks, still shocked that he’s hold his best friend in his hand.

“It must have been that rock I broke!” Zach exclaimed, motioning over to the box that once contained the rock. “I told you it shrinks people!”

“This is unbelievable…we need to get you back to normal. Lets go the that antique store right now and…”

“Wait!” Zach shouted, cutting his older friend off. “Why do we have to do that so soon? I’m not in danger now that you’ve found me, and it’s really awesome at this size!”

“Zach….do you hear what you’re saying? You can’t stay like this! It’s dangerous like that, not fun!”

“It can be fun! Put me on the floor and I’ll show you!”

“What? No! What if I lose…”

“If you don’t put me down I’m going to jump onto your pants and climb down!” the high school student warned, cutting his bro off again.

“Okay, okay!” Matt says, not wanting his friend to accidentally hurt himself. Zach balances himself on his brother’s palm as it slowly descends to the rugged floor. Once it’s low enough, he jumps off and immediately races for Matt’s left foot. Before Matt can even notice, Zach leaps against his brother’s cotton-covered foot and burrows his face into the fabric. Matt almost gapes as he watches Zach take deep breaths of his sweaty socks.

“Um…Zach…what are you doing?” Matt asks. He is so surprised by his brother’s actions that those are the only words he can muster.

“What does it look like I’m doing?” he replies, taking his face out of the sock. His youthful face is covered with sock lint, but it doesn’t seem to bother him. “I’m doing exactly the thing we always write about! Your feet smell terrible, by the way. “ Despite his words, Zach pushes his face back into the sock to get another smell. He seems to like the terrible odor.

“Zach…this isn’t a story.” Matt says, trying to talk some sense into his friend. Instead of listening to his elder bro, Zach grabs handfuls of the sock and begins to pull with all his strength. Despite his size, Matt can feel his sock slowly inching off his foot. At this rate it’ll take all day to come off, however, and something inside Matt makes him reach down and tug the garment right off. Once the bare foot is exposed, Zach dives between two of Matt’s toes and starts snorting up the toe jam. The giant Matt gasps in surprise as he feels the odd sensation between his toes. “Aren’t you going a bit far?”

“Don’t you like it?” asks Zach’s muffled voice. Whether he heard him or not, Matt defiantly feels when Zach starts lapping up the toe gunk. He gasps again and bites his lip. He didn’t want to say it out loud, but it DID feel kind of good…

While Matt was trying to decide whether he liked this or not, he suddenly looked down to find Zach gone. He looks around the floor thinking Zach had run off, but is corrected when he feels something wet brush against his sole. Zach had crawled underneath his foot and started licking his sole! Matt pivots his foot onto his heel and spots his brother lying on his back. The hyper boy is soon back on his feet and hugging the giant foot. Matt feels him start to lick again and shudders at the feeling.

“Zach…we should really get you some help…” Matt mutters weakly.

“Just a while longer! Please!” Zach begs as he snuggles up against Matt’s foot. The twenty-year-old just stares down at the shrunken boy for a moment before making a decision.
121.title: Matt's Discovery and Zach's Fun

choices: As he thought, Zach was down for it!
No, Zach thinks that is going too far!
1211.content: "Alright, you little deviant!" Matt chuckles at the sight of hìs brother lapping his toes. Matt got a weird thought, maybe his brother was gay! If so, then maybe he'd be into doing something else. "Zach? Would you like to have sex with me?"
1211.title: Matt agrees. He's starting to enjoy this...

122.content: "Bloody bugs". Zach heard his brother say,to his horror Matt's foot landed heavily on Zach's chest.Matt looks down at the 'bug' squirming under his foot.Zach could smell the terrible stench of Matt's feet,it made him choke and gag on the thick smell hanging in the air.Matt presses down hard on the 'bug',forcing Zach's head into the gapes between his toes.Zach could feel his ribs being cracked and bending under the weight of his brother,he screamed in pain as his chest imploded.Zach's organs were forced up and out of his mouth,he was choking on his own body,then it was just too much and Zach's body finally gave in and was crushed into a bloody pulp under Matt's feet.Matt felt the 'bug' splat under his weight,smiling at the thought of ending another life,but to his horror he lifted his foot up and looked at the guts and could see Zach's face flattened against his sole.He had ended a life alright,but it was the life of his brother.
122.title: Matt spots Zach, but thinks he's a bug.

choices: The Boys Go To The Nearest City and Cause Chaos
The Police Arrive On The Scene!
The Boys Start To Grow Again
13.content:
Once the light fades both Zach and Matt are a bit disoriented, they both see specks in front of their eyes like they had just had their picture taken. They both walked around stupidly, rubbing their eyes trying to clear away the spots.

Eventually both boys' vision cleared and they found each other and hugged. That was when Matt noticed something....odd. "Um...Little bro? Why aren't we in my room anymore?"

The boys broke their hug and looked around, it was true. They were outside now.

"Whoa....Check this out!" Zach said as he stooped down near Matt's feet.

"Huh?" Matt stooped down too and saw what he had been standing on. He gasped, "No...way."

What Matt had been stepping on was his own house, only....it was really tiny! Tiny enough to be crunched under both boys' feet like a cheap dollhouse! Matt and Zach looked at each other, then looked around.

Sure enough, everything else was tiny too!

"Big brother, I think we.....I think we grew!"

"Y-yeah...either that or everything else is just really small!"

"So...what should we do big brother?"

Matt put a hand on his chin and thought, absentmindedly tapping his sneaker on the ground below, making a mini earthquake for the people in their houses and anyone else nearby.

Matt felt something heavy ram into the side of his foot, causing him to jerk out of his thoughts. He looked down irritably at the thing and saw it was one of those vans soccer moms are so fond of. The fat woman inside even had the nerve to honk at him!

Matt glared down at the car, and without moving his giant foot, picked it up.

Zach watched his brother with intrigue as he emptied out the car of its occupants. Which included the fat woman, and her two kids, into his palm. Zach came over and looked down at the shouting woman and the terrified children. Matt rolled his eyes, getting more annoyed by the stereotypical soccer mom's voice by the minute. He looked over at his little bro and grinned, getting an idea. "Remember how the people in our stories used to deal with tinies who hadn't accepted the giants as their gods yet?"

The way Zach's eyes lit up was priceless. Then he put on the best evil grin he could manage and turned down towards the people in Matt's palm. "Usually they were stuffed in the giants' shoes or armpits. But I think we don't need to keep this bunch, they don't seem very submissive." Zach said smirking.

Matt grinned and, giving the kids to Zach, and keeping the soccer mom for himself. Matt licked his lips and opened his mouth, tossing the soccer mom in without a moment's hesitation. He chewed her to bits, letting the children watch from Zach's hand as he swallowed their bitch of a mom.

Zach chuckled and turned to the tinies in his hand, he shrugged and popped them into his mouth, he didn't chew them but only swallowed them whole after sloshing them around for a bit and they stopped moving.

Matt put his hands on his hips, "That bitch gave me a great idea....This is such an opportunity bubbie! We're gods now!"

"Heheh yep!"

"And gods need slaves right?"

"Uh huh!"

"So lets go into the nearest city and enslave the people there!"

"Yay!" Zach jumped up and down happily, crushing the woman's van under his sneaker.
13.title: Giant Brothers

choices: The brothers split the slaves between them.
Matt lets Zach have them and goes to find his own.
The brothers torture the slaves together.
131.content:
Without wasting any time, the giant Matt started stomping down the street with his younger brother following closely behind. They left the demolished remains of Matt’s house and the soccer mom’s van behind them. That wasn’t the only destruction they left behind, however. Matt and Zach both lived in a small neighborhood next to a larger city. The two giants stomped through the neighborhood they both grew up in, uncaring of the houses and people they stomped on. Some of the houses their feet tore through belonged to their other friends. Some of the cars they kicked off the street were owned by their neighbors. A few stupid acquaintances even stood in the giants’ path and stared up at them in awe. These people were either stepped on unnoticed or plucked up and popped into one of the boys’ mouths.

Eventually the duo arrived at the city, leaving almost their entire neighborhood looking like a tornado hit it. Both brothers looked at the large buildings around them and the streets below. Their large feet had brought traffic to a complete stop. It was like the city had been frozen in time; all eyes on them.

“Wow. I’ve been to the city before, but it looks so different! Everything’s so much smaller.” Zach grinned and turned to a nearby skyscraper. The teen approached the building and looked at himself reflected off the glass. His grin widened as he started to playfully flex.

“Well everything is small when you’re a god.” Matt said as he reached down and grabbed a blue car that was trying to speed through his legs. The giant young man brought the car up to his face and peered inside. The driver’s seat was occupied by an adult male, while the back seats contained two kids…probably the man’s children. One of the kids (the older looking one) mouthed the word “awesome” as he stared at Matt. The giant just smirked and mercilessly crushed the vehicle (and its passengers) in his fist. He tossed the crushed car over his shoulder and into a building, imbedding the twisted metal into the building’s frame. Wonder if the kid thought THAT was awesome…

“Hey, what are you doing, bubbie? I thought we were going to enslave them?”

“We are,” Matt replied before stomping a car flat under his sneaker. “But first we’re going to cause chaos and show these insects why we’re the gods and they’re the slaves!”

“Ooooh, I see!” Zach said before turning back to the skyscraper, rearing his fist back, and punching a hole right through the structure. The people inside that couldn’t get out of the way fast enough (which was a lot) were mowed down by the giant’s hand. Zach removed his fist from the skyscraper and brushed it against his shirt. He then delivered a swift kick to the lower part of the building; his sneaker-clad foot tearing through the frail supports of the building. The damage was worse than a bomb explosion and the building soon crumbled without its bottom supports. Zach stepped away from the collapsing building with a smile on his face.

“This is fun!” he shouted as he scanned the ground for something smaller to ruin. He spotted a small convenience store and cracked his knuckles. The mighty teen bent his knees and jumped high into the air, coming down on the store with a thunderous boom that shook the entire city. With the store obliterated under his feet Zach began stomping down on the nearby buildings, crashing his shoes through roof after roof.

While Zach was doing this, Matt was marching down the street watching all the people flee from his towering form. The older god chuckled and peered into a building to his left. He found the building was a lot emptier than he thought, but glanced down to find all its occupants fleeing out the entrance. Matt smirked wickedly and raised one of his feet over the crowd. With a deafening thoom, Matt brought the foot down with enough force to crack the road and send a tremor through the pavement. He lifted his foot up and inspected the bottom. Many people had been crushed and their mangled remains now decorated the trends of his sneaker. The giant scanned the damage done to the area and spotted several survivors among the rubble. Without giving any of them a chance to get back to their feet, Matt picked them up and tossed them all into his mouth. Some he crushed with his molars; others he swallowed whole. No matter how he ate them, they all tasted delicious!

The giant brothers rampaged through the area for over an hour. No matter how many buildings they toppled or how people they snuffed out, neither boy was showing any signs of tiring. Zach was deciding to take a break from “remodeling” and scratched his stomach through his shirt. The teenage god stomped toward Matt, grabbing a handful of people from the flooded street below. The city folk were all trying to escape from the rampaging boys, but their desperation left all of them easy prey for the giants. Matt popped the people into his mouth one by one, swallowing each of them whole. He didn’t like chewing them like his big bro did, instead enjoying the feeling of them squirming down his throat and into his stomach.

Matt turned to the approaching Zach and smiled. “Hey now, bubbie! Don’t eat them all; we still need some of them to enslave.”

Zach gulped down one more person before nodding. The two giants looked down at Zach’s hand to see four people the teen hadn’t gobbled up yet. One was a woman, one a man, one a teenager around Zach’s age, and the last one was a young kid. Matt smirked down at the four toothily, making them cringe.

“Congratulations. You four are the first to be enslaved by your new gods!”
131.title: Brotherly Destruction

choices: Matt Goes Barefoot and Joins In
Matt Declines and Has SOmething Else In Store for the tinies
1312.content:
"You can have these ones little bro, I'm gonna find my own." Matt said smiling at his little brother.

Zach's eyes lit up, was big bro really gonna let him have these four slaves all to himself? "Ya mean it? I can have em?"

Matt chuckled and put a hand on Zach's shoulder, "Yup! You get the first four slaves to yourself!" Matt smiled kindly at Zach as Zach seemed to be bursting with joy and love for his big bro.

Matt stomped off into the city to look for his own slaves, while Zach looked down at his four slaves. They didn't seem to be related, just a bunch of people picked out of the blue. Zach sighed and sat down on a building, which caused the windows to blow out from his weight. He chuckled and then, using one shoe to pry the other off, he kicked off his well worn sneakers. He giggled as he felt the cool air through his hole ridden dingy socks. The socks were ripped in some places and turning gray instead of white from wear.

Zach stretched out his feet and legs and wiggled his toes through the socks.

"Heh heh......" he smirked, put his feet on the ground and stood up from the building. He grinned wider as he looked around him and saw how his foot odor was affecting the people below. They were coughing and plugging their noses, they couldn't stand it! Which made Zach all the more prouder to have gone without changing his socks or bathing for awhile.

Just then Matt came up with a few slaves in hand, two women and a man. He greeted his brother cheerfully and took a deep whiff of the foot odor ridden air. "Must be heaven for the tinies down by your feet little bro." He said grinning along with Zach.

Zach giggled and wiggled his toes before siting down in the middle of the street and, putting the tinies in his lap, he peeled his socks off to reveal two greasy feet covered in flecks of lint. Zach chuckled and placed his own slaves near his feet, causing them to react much the same as the rest of the tinies.

"Wanna join me big bro?" Zach said wiggling his linty toes.
1312.title: Slaves

choices: Some foot worship!
A nice game of Dodge the Feet!
13121.content:
“You don’t have to ask me twice!” Matt replied before taking a seat on a building across from where Zach was sitting. The building creaked under his weight and a couple of the floors seemed to collapse, as shown by the debris and dust that shot out from the windows. Matt dropped his three slaves on the ground in front of him and started untying his shoes. “So, how do you like your slaves, bro?”

“They’re okay for a starting bunch.” Zach answered as he smiled down at the four tinies by his feet. “I hope the kid can keep up with the rest, though. If he can’t…” Zach grinned evilly at the young boy, making him cower in fright.

Matt finished untying his shoes and stepped out of them, revealing his white socks. They were in much better condition than Zach’s, but they still looked a bit dirty and stained from sweat. Matt flexed his toes inside his sock a few times before pulling them right off, sending a cloud of white flecks into the air. The flecks came down upon Zach and the street below.

“Hey, watch where you take those off!” Zach said jokingly as he fanned the air in front of his nose.

“Hehe, sorry.” Matt dropped his scrunched up socks into his shoes and placed his sweaty bare feet before his trio of tinies. The people around them suffered even more now that there were two bare footed giants nearby. They coughed and became disoriented as the fumes polluted their air. The giant brothers didn’t care about them, however, and paid there full attention to the seven slaves before them. Matt smirked and raised one of his feet above his three. He wiggled his toes tauntingly, fanning foot odor down upon them in the process. The two women and the man coughed and held their noses with both hands. “What’s wrong? Can’t stand the smell? Well you’re going to have to if you want to live as my slave! If you can’t, there’s plenty more bugs in this city!”

To show the bugs how insignificant they really were, Matt lowered his foot upon them. They tried to get out of the way, but the god’s foot came down too fast and pinned them against the concrete street. Matt pushed down just enough to cause them some pain before he started rolling them around. The boys’ feet were so huge that they could completely cover three people under one sole.

“That looks like fun!” Zach exclaimed as he watched his big bro smothered the tinies under his stinky foot. Zach grins down at his own four bugs and raises is bare foot over them. Drops of sweat dripped down to the ground, smacking against the ground like hail. As Zach descended his foot upon the four, the slaves immediately tried to scatter to get out of the cast shadow. The kid and the adult male got out of the way, but the woman and teen couldn’t. They were forced flat against the road as Zach rolled their squirming bodies under the ball of his foot. Their bodies were getting drenched in foot sweat and they had no control ovr their bodies. They were completely at the giant teenager’s mercy…

“I haven’t forgotten about you two!” Zach said as he winked down at the young kid and the older man. They seemed to have forgotten the giant had another foot, since they were shocked when it appeared over them. Zach slowly brought the foot down while the buggy kid started to sob. Zach either didn’t notice the cry or ignored it, since his decent didn’t slow and the boy (along with the adult) was pinned under his other sole. Zach now had all his slaves under his feet and promptly rubbed them down.

The giant duo tortured their slaves for several minutes, soaking them with sweat and stink and making sure they knew how fearsome their feet could be. When the giants finally moved their feet away, their slaves were all twitching on the ground; their faces as green as a cucumber.

“Did you bugs like that?” Matt asked, not expecting any form of answer. “Now that you’ve been introduced to our feet, it’s time for some real fun!”

“Ooooh, what did you have in mind, big brother?” Zach asked, grinning like a child.
13121.title: Meet the Feet

choices: The brothers get bored and decide to do something else with their slaves.
The police are finally getting involved!
131211.content:
“Some good old fashioned foot worship!” Matt announced as he propped his feet on his heels, displaying them to his three tiny slaves with all their glory.

“Hehe, some foot worship sounds awesome!” Zach replied, getting all excited. “Just like the giants from our stories always do to their tiny slaves!”

“Bingo.” Matt grinned and then turned his attention to the seven littles below. “Okay, let me tell you how this is going to work, bugs!” Matt exclaimed, addressing both his slaves and his bro’s. “We’ve already showed you how sweaty, smelly, and powerful our feet have become, but now you have to give them the praise they deserve! You’re all going to rub them, lick them, and kiss them until we tell you to stop!”

The two groups of slaves looks up at Matt with disbelief. They had just been smothered under the nastiest things they’ve come across in their entire lives, and now they were expected to do all that to them?!

“B-but…that’s gross!” shouted the young boy from Zach’s group. The boy had just been crying, but now he was clenching his fists and showing some bravery before the older, bigger boys. His bravery quickly turned to cowardice when Zach stomped his foot right behind him, making him jump.

“You calling our feet grow, punk?!” Zach asked, glaring angrily down at the kid. “Don’t make me eat you like I did those two other kids!” Zach grinned down threateningly at the boy. The tiny instantly bowed his head and tried his best not to bawl like a baby. This giant teen didn’t seem to have any problem “dealing” with kids…

“Now…get to work!” Matt shouted, slamming his heels against the ground and cracking the street wide open. The man and two women nodded and ran to their master’s soles. The female duo vigorously rubbed his right foot while the man was left with his left. The big man’s feet smelled horrendous; turning the poor tinies pale and making them couch every other second. The sweat smeared over their hands like glue and it would not be easy to remove them. Matt stared down at his slaves and got such a rush of power. Writing about stuff like this was one thing; but actually experiencing it was another thing entirely. Being a giant would never get old!

Meanwhile, Zach kept himself seated on the road with his bare feet positioned on either side of his four slaves. The four shook with fright as the giant master wiggled his toes in anticipation.

“Hehe, hurry up and worship! Do it, do it, DO IT!” The giant’s lack of patience was enough to tell his slaves they better get a move on. The teenager and the kid hurried to his left foot while the two adults focused on his right. The giant boy watched as they all started rubbing and licking his soles, making him feel really good. Even the scared little kid was lapping up the boy’s sweat like his life depended on it…which it did! Judging by the look on his face; he wasn’t enjoying his new life at all. He probably missed his mommy and wanted to go back to his carefree, comfortable life…well too bad! The kid and all the other slaves were gonna lick up their masters’ sweat and they were gonna like it!

“Looks like you’re getting some tongue action over there, bro.” Matt noticed before looking down annoyed at his trio of slackers. “You start licking too! Give my feet some nice smooches too!” Matt laughed evilly as the slaves did as they were told and started dragging their tongues against his sweat soaked soles. Every now and then they would quickly kiss the foot they were worshipping; showing how much they “adored” this torture.

The two best buds relaxed their for awhile, not saying anything more to their slaves and just letting them do as they were instructed. All of a sudden…
131211.title: The First Taste

choices: about 1ft compared to Zach & 3 times bigger than the tiny slaves (Mini Giant)
Smaller than the tiny slaves
1312111.content:
Matt watches the tiny slaves worshipping Zach's soft, sweaty feet. He feels himself getting hard as he looks at the wriggling toes, and wrinkled soles.

After the light released from the crystal knocked Matt out, he awoke sometime later. He groaned as he sat up and tried to adjust is eyes to the light.

“Ugh…my head. What the hell happened?” Matt asked himself as he looked around, but found things were still a bit blurry. He was sitting on the floor, so he must of fallen out of his chair at some point. He reaches his hand behind him to feel for the chair, but touches nothing but the hard wood of the floor. Annoyed, Matt rubs his eyes vigorously until he can see clearly and looks behind him to find the chair. All he sees in the floor…but something’s odd about it. Not only is it a different color than his own floor, but it looked…wider for some reason. Matt figured out why the moment he picked his head up and looked around the rest of the room. “No…way.”

Matt was sitting in the middle of a completely different room…a GIANT completely different room. Everything; the bed, shelves, windows, and other furniture were all giant sized! Matt deduced that he was only a few inches tall compared to everything else. As Matt continued to stare at his surroundings in awe, he suddenly remembered Zach.

“Zach! Where are you?” Matt yells as he spins around. “Little bro!!”

“Over here, Matt!” hears the 20-year-old. Matt spots Zach running toward him from a few feet away.

“Zach! Where were you?” Matt asked once Zach had reached him.

“I just woke up a few seconds ago! You won’t believe it, big bro; I was laying on someone’s sock! It was huge and it smelled nasty!”

“Okay…so…that stone shrunk us somehow. That’s just great…” Matt couldn’t believe he was saying that.

“Now just that, big brother! It sent us to an anime world too!”

“Don’t be silly, Zach. What makes you think this is an anime world? People don’t just warp into fictional worlds.”

“People don’t shrink either.”

“Touché. Still, I don’t think-”

Before Matt could finish, both brothers were startled by the sound of a door swinging open. The two boys looked over at the bedroom’s door and saw the most shocking thing in the form of a titanic person. The figure stood in the doorway for a few seconds, observing his room, before beginning to march inside.

“Matt…that’s…”

“Impossible. That means we really are in another world! We’re in Soul Eater!”

“Matt, he’s heading right for us! He’ll step on us if we don’t move!” Zach shouted as he tugged on Matt’s arm.

“Shit, right!” Matt muttered as he just now noticed the booming sounds creating by the giant’s shoes. The two best friends ran out of the figures way as quickly as possible, just barely managing to escape before one of the shoes crushed them like bugs. “So bored…” mumbled the giant figure to the empty room. At least…he THOUGHT it was empty. He had not yet spotted the two bugs on his floor. Who was this giant character from Soul Eater, anyway?

“Screw you! Let us go!” Matt yelled. Soul looked down amused at him “Us? Looks to me like you’re the only one who wants to leave” He pointed at tiny Zach, who was kissing the veins on the top of the giant’s foot.

“And pretty soon I’ll have you groveling at my feet too” The godly teen dropped his new pet on the floor, raised his foot, and stepped on him. He dragged him to the couch and sat himself down, chuckling when he saw his trained worshiper run toward him. "You better start licking before I start pressing" He pressed down hard to emphasize his point and relaxed it when he felt a cool tongue on his sole. Then...
143121121.title: Worship

choices: Matt Tickles Star's Armpit
Matt Tickles Star's Bare Feet
Black Star Starts to Wake Up
1432.content:
Black Star sat on his bed, bored out of his mind. Soul and Maka were gone on a far away mission, and Tsubaki was still in school. Black Star wondered if skipping school was such a good idea since he had no one to hang out with outside of school since everyone was busy.
Black Star sighed and slipped off his shoes which he had been wearing all day.

One shoe tipped over on it's side, Black Star wiggled his socked toes, but he was looking for a little more, so he stripped off one sock at a time, sending fluff and crud everywhere as the sock came flying off. "Ahhh...." Star sighed in delight as he wiggled his cheesy bare toes which hadn't seen a wash in a good long time.

Black Star swung his legs up on the bed and laced his hands behind his head, soon he was fast asleep, letting the cool air blow between his toes, it felt good.

Meanwhile down below the bed, Matt and Zach saw everything. The shoes came off and bounced inches away from them, and the dirty socks fell down on top of them! "Ugh! This smell is awful!" Zach said to his big brother.

No response.

"Um....Big brother?" Zach poked his head out from under the wet sock to see that his brother was scaling the sheets that were falling into the floor. "Big brother! Don't!" Zach yelped as he ran over. Zach looked up at Matt just as he climbed onto the bed, Zach was afraid of heights and he didn't have the guts to do what his big bro did. So he decided to hope for the best and stay on the floor.

Matt was already all the way up to the bed though, and he saw a sleeping blue haired titan, snoring loudly.

"Hmm...I have to wake him up somehow...to get his help."
1432.title: Black Star

choices: Zach swallows his fears and climbs up the bed covers.
Black Star wakes up for some reason.
14321.content:
Matt gazed over Black Star’s expansive body, looking for a way to wake the titan from his slumber. He suddenly noticed that the teen’s muscled arms were folded behind his head, exposing his light haired pits. Matt smirked before he dashed over to the nearest armpit. As he got closer, he began to doubt his initial plan…

“Ugh…maybe this isn’t such a good idea.” Matt mumbles to himself as he pinches his nose. The air reeks of Black Star’s B.O. and Matt can clearly see that his pits are covered with sweat. He can’t turn back now, however. He needs to get Black Star’s attention so he can help them. Matt takes a moment to prepare himself before taking a deep breath and lunging for the meister’s pits. He sinks his hands into the underarm and begins tickling Black Star. Despite being so small, Matt’s touch still registers with the giant who snorts loudly and begins chuckling.

Back on the floor, Zach hears the sounds Black Star is making and wonders what’s going on up there. Just as he thinks this, he hears a voice call out to him…

“I think he’s waking up, Zach!” shouts Matt from atop the bed.

“M-Matt! Don’t do that!” Zach calls back. “It almost never ends well when someone tries to wake a sleeping giant!”

“Calm down, little bro! What’s the worse that could-” But Matt doesn’t finish, and his sentence his interrupted by a sudden scream. Zach’s eyes widen in horror.

“Big brother!!! Are you okay!!” he shouts, but gets no reply. He starts to fear the worst…

On top of the bed, Matt’s tickling had disrupted Black Star’s sleep and caused him to roll over. Matt was now pinned between the mattress and Black Star’s own smelly pit! The tiny man tries to push the giant off him, but…well…yeah, that doesn’t work.

“I can’t believe this!” Matt shouts in annoyance. “Now I know how the characters in my stories feel…”

As Matt tries to squirm out from underneath the giant, Black Star suddenly starts to murmur in his sleep. He’s dreaming about something and starts to sway back and forth while smiling. This movement causes his pit to rub against his bed, thus unknowingly smothering the tiny Matt! Matt squeezes his eye shut as he’s covered in armpit hair and perspiration. Eventually, Black Star stops giving Matt a rubdown and resumes his motionless sleep. Matt opens his eyes to find that he is no longer pinned against the bed, but glued to Black Star’s armpit!

“Oh, come on!” Matt groans as he pounds against Black Star’s skin with little effect. “Wake up! Your pits stink!”

Several feet away, Zach is still wondering what has become of his longtime friend. Did Black Star roll over and crush him like a bulldozer?! Was Matt just knocked out? Zach wants to find out the answers, but his fear of heights prevents him from following his brother. Still…Matt could be injured!
14321.title: Matt in the Pits

choices: Woke Up When He Felt A Pit Hair Yanked
Slept Through It
143211.content:
Zach gulped and, summoning what little courage he had, began scaling the bedcovers.

"Don't look down, don't look down." He kept murmuring to himself as he scaled slowly higher and higher. Meanwhile Matt is still stuck in Black Star's sweaty armpit. And he is about to be sick from the terrible smell. "If I get out of this I'll never subject another anime character to this kind of thing again.....maybe." Matt thought.

Suddenly a ray of hope appears as his little brother Zach collapses onto the bed. "*pant* *pant*...there...now I just gotta-Oh my god Matt!" Zach shouted in fear as he saw the state his bro was in.

"I know I know!" Matt said, although is was muffed by Black Star's armpit flesh.

"Don't worry bro, I'll get you out of here!" Zach said approaching the pit. "Eww....this really stinks." Zach said as he began to pull on Matt's hand.

"Tell me about it..." Matt muttered.

After much pulling and tugging, Matt finally and surprisingly came loose! The problem was that the two boys tumbled in a heap off the edge of the bed and landed in Star's shoe!

Black Star....
143211.title: Free from the Pit...but not everything else.

choices: Black Star heads to his personal workout room and does some training.
Black Star goes outside for a walk.
1432111.content:
Black Star awoke with a groan and sat up, rubbing his armpit with his hand.

“Ow…the hell was that?” Black Star muttered to himself as he raised his arm and looked at his pit. “Felt like something tugged on my armpit hairs!” the blue haired ninja took a quick glance around the room, but didn’t find a hint of anyone else being there. If he had looked down on the bed, he would of seen that a few of his pit hairs had been pulled our.

Meanwhile…

“Ugh…my head.” Matt grumbled as he got to his feet and looked down at Zach, who was also getting to his feet. “You okay, little bro?”

“I’m fine…” Zach replied, rubbing the back of his head. “The ground here is surprisingly soft…and wet. …where are we, brother?”

“Well, judging by the…ugh…smell, I’d say we’re in a shoe.” Matt glanced up and looked out the opening of the shoe. “Yep, defiantly in one of Black Star’s shoes!”

“It stinks!” Zach cried as he pinched his nose. “It’s a good thing he’s still sleeping…”

“Yeah, but we should get out of her before he…” Matt started to say, but stopped when he noticed Zach’s face had turned into one of horror. “…Zach? What’s wrong?”

“B-big…b-bro…l-l-look u-up!” Zach shouted, pointing up toward the opening. Matt tilted his head and looked straight up. Black Star was awake and sitting on the bed…with one of his bare feet heading right for them!

“RUIN!!!” Matt shouted as he darted for the toe section of the shoe with Zach in front of him. As the enormous foot of Black Star crept into the footwear, both brothers knew they wouldn’t be able to escape it. They could only try and not end up under his sole!

“Well, I can’t get back to sleep now!” came Black Star’s voice from high above. “May as well find something else to do…”

“B-brother! He’s going to crush us!” Zach shouted. “I don’t want to end up a red stain!”

“Don’t worry, Zach! Just-!” Matt turned around and gasped with surprise. “GET DOWN!”

Matt pushed Zach to the ground and went down with him. A second later, the giant foot passed over them and came to a rest in the shoe. Matt and Zach were underneath the titan’s toes, so there wasn’t a crushing pressure that would have been if they were under his sole.

“Matt…it stinks.” Zach coughed as he breathed in nothing but the meister’s foot odor. Black Star, oblivious to the two bugs in his shoe, flexed his toes and stood up. The two buds felt their prison shake as the giant started walking.

“The pit was much worse than this. Just try to endure it.” Matt said to Zach as he laid down next to him, holding the younger boy close.
1432111.title: Nice and Snug in the Shoe

choices: Black Star begins to smother Matt under his foot.
Black Star squeezes Matt between his toes.
14322.content:
Matt remembered that Black Star had taken off his footwear before falling asleep. He looks down the titan’s body before his eyes fall upon the assassin’s bare feet. Both of the brothers had seen how sweaty the feet looked and they probably smelled bad too, but Matt had no choice but to get near them if he wanted to wake the behemoth up. Therefore, without thinking it over again, Matt ran over to Black Star’s nearest foot. It took longer because of his reduced size, but he eventually made it in front of the towering foot. Matt was in awe at how big it was…

“Well, here goes nothing…” Matt says to himself as he cracks his fingers and begins to tickle the blue haired titan’s sole. The reaction was almost spontaneous; Black Star’s foot began to fidit and he laughed in his sleep.

“Hehehe, stop that!” Black Star mumbled in his sleep.

“Hey, Matt, what’s going on up there?” Zach asked his brother, shouting up to him.

“I’m tickling his foot to try and wake him up!” replied Matt, much to Zach’s surprise.

“Are you crazy, Matt?! That’s dangerous!”

“Don’t worry, I’m being careful.”

Zach, however, wasn’t too sure of his brother’s words. Since Zach knew Matt as near Black Star’s feet, the shrunken teen ran around the bed until he was behind it. As he ran, he heard Black Star speak in his sleep again.

“Hehe…stop that…stupid bug…”

“Matt!! He thinks it’s part of his dream!” Zach yelled as he looked up the end of the bed, but still couldn’t see his bro.

“Then I’ll just have to tickle harder!” Matt said as he began tickling even faster. The increase in speed caused Black Star to twitch his foot, a movement that sent Matt several inches backwards. “Ow…son of a-”

“Damn bugs.” Matt heard Black Star say before he saw a shadow engulf him. The older of the two friends looked up with horror as he saw Black Star’s foot hanging above him. He immediately turned around and ran, but it was too late. The foot came down…

“Matt! Are you okay?” Zach cried. He had heard what Black Star said and feared that the teenaged meister had woken up and thought Matt was a bug.

“I’m…fine…” Matt answered back weakly. Even though it sounded like he was in pain, Zach was glad he was at least alive. What had happened was that Black Star had dreamed about stomping the bug that was tickling him, but thankfully his mattress was soft so Matt wasn’t squished. Instead he was pinned underneath Black Star’s gargantuan toes with only his upper half free from the pressure. He tried to pull himself free, but Black Star was keeping his foot planted flat against the bed. Matt was forced t just lay there as he felt his body being covered with foot odor and sweat…

Unluckily for Matt, Black Star’s dream isn’t over yet…
14322.title: Matt Underfoot

choices: Bleach
Pokemon
Other
145.content: There are many other anime here.
145.title: Other

info.brief_description: Two close friends find their lives changed with a little shrinking.
info.description:
This is a shrinking story thought up by Cryptosporidium137 and myself. It involves two close friends, Matt and Zach (who are also meant to represent ourselves), that find their normal lives changed when one of them (or both) shrink. They can either shrink in the real world or in an anime world.

1. This is a m/m story only. If you want a giantess or SW story, go somewhere else please.
2. Matt and Zach are the only ones that can shrink
3. No one line chapters unless it's a choice chapter.
4. Any type of interaction is allowed.
5. Matt and Zach are not invincible.
6. You can introduce other characters besides Matt and Zach
7. Do not spam the story.
8. Please add and have fun!
